summary: Three women in a maternity ward reveal their lives and intimate thoughts to each other while in a maternity ward together, where they face the choice of keeping their babies or offering them for adoption.
cast: Eva Dahlbeck|Ingrid Thulin|Bibi Andersson|Barbro Hiort af Ornäs|Erland Josephson|Max von Sydow|Gunnar Sjöberg|Ann-Marie Gyllenspetz|Inga Landgré|Kristina Adolphson|Bengt Blomgren|Monica Ekberg|Maud Elfsiö|Inga Gill|Gun Jönsson|Sissi Kaiser|Margaretha Krook|Lars Lind|Gunnar Nielsen
title: En el umbral de la vida
